name: provisionNetworkClients
description: Provisions a client with a name and policy. Clients can be provisioned before they associate to the network.

clients.description: The array of clients to provision

mac.description: The MAC address of the client. Required.

name.description: The display name for the client. Optional. Limited to 255 bytes.

devicePolicy.description: The policy to apply to the specified client. Can be 'Group policy', 'Allowed', 'Blocked', 'Per connection' or 'Normal'. Required.

groupPolicyId.description: The ID of the desired group policy to apply to the client. Required if 'devicePolicy' is set to "Group policy". Otherwise this is ignored.

policiesBySecurityAppliance.description: An object, describing what the policy-connection association is for the security appliance. (Only relevant if the security appliance is actually within the network)

devicePolicy.description: The policy to apply to the specified client. Can be 'Allowed', 'Blocked' or 'Normal'. Required.

policiesBySsid.description: An object, describing the policy-connection associations for each active SSID within the network. Keys should be the number of enabled SSIDs, mapping to an object describing the client's policy

devicePolicy.description: The policy to apply to the specified client. Can be 'Allowed', 'Blocked', 'Normal' or 'Group policy'. Required.

groupPolicyId.description: The ID of the desired group policy to apply to the client. Required if 'devicePolicy' is set to "Group policy". Otherwise this is ignored.
